data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30441, Version Hash: 5cef09fafbb46c3d0b505fcc3a1864a062681741
data.actual_result: The list of members/mention menu becomes partially transparent and freezes.
data.expected_result: The list of members/mention menu disappears.
data.short_description: If one types "@" in the message bar while one loses Send Messages permissions, the mention menu freeezes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a friend. - Type "@" in the message bar (the list of members should appear). - Force your friend to remove Send Messages permissions from you.
